charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(D): POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE MARIJUANA; 18:2 AIDING AND ABETTING(1)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP 8 months (Said term shall run consecutively to sentence imposed in DNM case #2:14-CR-02004-001ERW, for a total term of 16 months. Total term of 16 months shall run as a Split Sentence, 8 months in the custody of BOP and 8 months on Home Detention.); 1 year Supervised Release (Said term shall run concurrently to Supervised Release imposed in DNM case #2:14-CR-02004-001ERW) with Special Conditions imposed; SPA of $100.00

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) Possession with intent to distribute 51.5 pounds of Marijuana; 21:846 Conspiracy; 21:952 Importation of Marijuana
